The Omni Group Phone Support Human
item.description: <p>The Omni Group is growing our band of Support Humans (also known as our Tech Support team). Our search is for coworkers who are great at cheerfully helping customers with our macOS and iOS products on the phone, as well as via email, Twitter, and on our forums. Support Humans work together as a team and with customers to answer questions, solve problems, and (whenever possible) have surprisingly pleasant conversations about software.</p><p>We look for hires with positivity, great phone skills, and who are good at thinking through problems on a computer they can‚Äôt actually see. We don‚Äôt rely on binders of troubleshooting scripts; your imagination will be one of your most important tools.</p><h3>Job Activities</h3><p>When customers call with questions about our Mac &amp; iOS apps, you‚Äôre their first contact. Know the answer? Great! If not, gather information and we‚Äôll help you find it. (You should enjoy learning about technology; even if you know a lot, you‚Äôre going to learn more here.)</p><p>When it comes to inventing great software, we believe being friendly is at least as important as being smart. If you need help with a problem, you‚Äôll have plenty of people to ask - and they‚Äôll be happy to talk about it. When we disagree, we do it respectfully. No one furthers themselves by tearing you down.</p><h3>Compensation and Benefits</h3><p>Our amazing customers love our apps and push them to their limits. If earning gratitude by helping them brings you happiness, you‚Äôll enjoy this job. We depend on Support Humans when crafting our products; they speak for and represent our customers‚Äô needs.</p><p>We offer a base salary in the mid-$40k/year range, a 401k with matching, incredible insurance for you and your family, and the potential for profit sharing. We are an equal opportunity employer. We know our industry has a diversity problem; we‚Äôre trying to be part of the solution.</p><p>We also offer lots of other great benefits, which you can read about elsewhere on our website. Please see the full job posting and instructions for applying at <a href="https://www.omnigroup.com/jobs/">https://www.omnigroup.com/jobs/</a>.</p><h3>To Apply</h3><p>To apply, send email to <a href="mailto:resumes@omnigroup.com><a href="mailto:&#114;e&#115;&#x75;&#x6d;&#x65;&#x73;&#64;&#x6f;&#x6d;n&#105;&#x67;&#114;o&#117;&#112;&#46;c&#111;m">&#114;e&#115;&#x75;&#x6d;&#x65;&#x73;&#64;&#x6f;&#x6d;n&#105;&#x67;&#114;o&#117;&#112;&#46;c&#111;m</a></a>; include the exact phrase ‚ÄúPhone Support Human‚Äù in the subject line. Include a copy of your r√©sum√© in text, HTML, RTF or PDF form. Please note: if you submit a Word document, you will not be considered for the position. No phone calls or visits to the office, please. Every applicant that sends a resume before May 15th will receive a set of sample support questions to work on; applicants will have until May 22nd to submit responses. Those answers are by far the most important factor we‚Äôll use when selecting applicants to invite in for interviews.</p>
